author: Soo Kim
title: Coronavirus U.S. Map, Update As Death Toll Nearly Doubles, White House Warns Rural Americans 'You Have to Prepare'
description: As cases continue to soar in the country, a U.S. health expert on the COVID-19 task force, Dr. Anthony Fauci, warns up to 200,000 Americans could die from the virus.
content: The coronavirus epidemic in the U.S., which has more cases than any other country, continues with more than 143,500 affected. Nearly 2,500 have died, while at least 4,865 have recovered from infection, according to the latest figures from Johns Hopkins Univer… [+8797 chars]
